entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json code gen: ignored properties are not completely ignored #58320
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in WinMD assembly resolution #58319
  • References from one dynamic assembly to another dynamic assembly sometimes do not result in an AppDomain.TypeResolve event #58313
  • Fix VN for float <-> integer reinterpreting casts #58312
  • String.Equals(other, Ordinal) could be faster if the length comparsion was moved up #58310
  • Runtime silent installation progress #58307
  • IsStructMarshalable fails on C# arrays and fixed arrays with explicit bounds and attributes #58305

Closed

  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed 'emitTypeSizes[TypeGet(type)] > 0 Generate code' #57913
    7.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed 'varDsc->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT Generate code' #57917
    7.0.0
  • `Graphics.DrawString` fails to render certain unicode characters. #56948
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor fgInitArgInfo to track non standard arg kinds #58324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update `GetCurrFrame()` assert during x86 function unwind #58323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Allow RuntimeType arguments in CustomAttributeBuilder #58317
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix fgValueNumberArrIndexVal for wide reads #58309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Nullable improvements for `Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegment` №2 #58308
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Delete test projects under src/tests/hosting #58304
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Remove PEDecoder::HasNativeHeader (always false) #58303
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update native COM server tests to execute directly instead of using the Exe launcher program. #58302
    test enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #58281
    area-codeflow
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Support RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements #58275
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix a few corner case overflow operations #58265
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.0
  • Clean-up duplicated PathInternal files #57988
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix a few places where we did not use Register type for struct locals. #58082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Disable fast path serialization for types with properties using custom converters. #58291
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set _ep_arch_info for s390x #56427
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58036
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Skip System.Text.Json tests on iOS/tvOS that don't work #58276
    area-System.Text.Json, os-ios
  • [release/6.0] Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58253
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Disable JitStress for Github_25027 #58250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix a minor assert issue in long decomposition #57326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft fix for 43752] Mark PLINQ as enabled in WASM and make browser compat changes #58227
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58280
    area-codeflow
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58290
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: add PGO random stress testing support #58294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • roll r2r jobs into crossgen2-outerloop #58282
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Only look for exceptVars when resolving live-out EH vars #58243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable outerloop helix legs on the "runtime-coreclr outerloop" pipeline. #57068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
